tool_description: Stock API to get latest stock, chart pattern and dividend information.
name: Stock Finance
title: Stock Finance

api_list.name: StockDividendInformation
api_list.description:
This endpoint returns 4 summary properties of a stock related to dividends. 
1. Stock latest dividend date.
2. Stock dividend yield.
3. Stock annual dividend.
4. Stock dividend frequency.

api_list.name: StockInformation
api_list.description: This is a general endpoint providing response of the general stock information.

api_list.name: StockChartPattern
api_list.description:
This endpoint returns the prediction on how the stock chart pattern looks like. There could be three types of responses:-
1. Bearish
2. Bullish
3. Neutral
